metadata.description: iOS/macOS development skills for AI coding agents

plugins.name: carplay
plugins.description: CarPlay framework for building automotive apps including navigation, audio, communication, and utility experiences

plugins.name: swiftui
plugins.description: SwiftUI framework for building user interfaces across iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS

plugins.name: mapkit
plugins.description: MapKit framework for maps, annotations, directions, local search, and location features

plugins.name: sirikit
plugins.description: SiriKit framework for voice interactions, Shortcuts, custom intents, and intelligent suggestions

plugins.name: widgetkit
plugins.description: WidgetKit framework for widgets, Live Activities, watch complications, and controls

plugins.name: apple-foundation-models
plugins.description: Apple Foundation Models framework for on-device AI and LLM capabilities in iOS/macOS apps

plugins.name: proximity-reader
plugins.description: ProximityReader framework for Tap to Pay on iPhone, contactless payments, loyalty card (VAS) reading, Store and Forward, and mobile document/ID verification

plugins.name: apple-wallet
plugins.description: Apple Wallet passes — create, sign, distribute, and update boarding passes, event tickets, coupons, loyalty cards, and generic passes with PassKit

plugins.name: metal
plugins.description: Metal GPU programming — shaders (MSL), render/compute pipelines, buffer/texture management, ray tracing, MetalKit, MetalFX, and Metal 4 APIs
